meanings.sent1: The artist used fuchsia paint to create a vibrant sunset in the painting.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful fuchsia dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The room was so bright with fuchsia walls that it felt like a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned fuchsia with embarrassment when she tripped in front of everyone.
meanings.sent5: The fuchsia color of the flowers in the garden stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: A plant with bright pink or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: In her garden, she planted a fuchsia to add a pop of color.
meanings.sent2: The fuchsia in the backyard attracted hummingbirds with its vibrant blooms.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel nibbled on the fuchsia petals, leaving a trail of pink behind.
meanings.sent4: The fuchsia plant in the window seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicate fuchsia blossoms swayed gently in the breeze.
